scripts.migrate:push: pnpm run env-cmd migrate-development --use-shell "pnpm prisma db push"
scripts.migrate:drop: pnpm run env-cmd migrate-development --use-shell "pnpm prisma db drop"
scripts.simulate-edge-function: pnpm build && pnpm run env-cmd development node edge-runtime-local-simulated-entry.js
scripts.watch:simulate-edge-function: watch 'pnpm build && ./kill-edge-listener.sh && pnpm run env-cmd development node edge-runtime-local-simulated-entry.js' ./src
